entities.name: Harry Potter
entities.description: The main character in the story who is trying to summon his wand.

entities.name: Malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student who attacked Harry and is now recounting it to his fellow students.

relationships.description: Harry tries to summon his wand using the spell Accio, but it doesn't work.
Malfoy is recounting his attack on Harry to his fellow Slytherin students.
